name: Silver Rain(WIP)
description:
A few years after the war between Harbiet and Cies, the Syntient technology starts to develop, its predecessors and those next in line are at risk of its hazards.

Pinn, a veteran and a Syntient, ponders about his existence. Can he finally decide about his fate after the Silver Rain party?

This was made for I Can't Write But Want to Tell a Story jam.

Warning: May contain upsetting themes.

Art, code, writing: mintbiscuits
Writing: Ghostwriter
